titleStmt.title: The witches of Huntingdon, their examinations and confessions; exactly taken by his Majesties justices of peace for that county. Whereby will appeare haw craftily and dangerously the devill tempteth and seizeth on poore soules. The reader may make use hereof against hypocrisie, anger, malice, swearing, idolatry, lust, covetousnesse, and other grievous sins, which occasioned this their downfall.
titleStmt.author: Davenport, John, fl. 1646.

titleStmt.title: The witches of Huntingdon, their examinations and confessions; exactly taken by his Majesties justices of peace for that county.
